analysis.heading: Plan view showing how to determine average grade
analysis.content: When measuring daylight plane, height is measured from the average of the grade at the midpoint of the building and the grade of the closest point on the abutting site. For this side of this structure, the average grade is the average of the grades at these two points.
figures: Fig 21: Plan view showing building layout with subject house, neighbors, yards, and measurement points
Fig 22: Detail showing allowable eave protrusion with 2' max measurement and daylight plane intersection
